website_summaries.verdict: For a sweet price, get a slim and stylish monitor with amazing response time, top-notch color accuracy, and eyestrain reduction.
pros: Setup is quick and trouble-free right out of the box
Power button and outputs easy to locate on back of monitor
Excellent brightness and crisp images for a low-cost model
Large enough for most uses without being intrusive
cons: While the monitor does tilt, it's very stiff and not easy to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Quality and ease of use are excellent. A glaring issue is the inability to attach ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality and ease of use are excellent. A glaring issue is the inability to attach the monitor to a dual monitor mount. The stand the monitor comes with can be removed, but where it connects to the monitor cannot. It gets in the way of any monitor mount.
customer_reviews.author: Philip N.

customer_reviews.title: Overall it is a great screen, very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a great screen, very sharp, bright, high contrast, with vivid colors. I'm using it for home office. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars (instead of 5) is that switching between the sources is bit cumbersome: you press the toggle button to show the control window, then rock the button to select the Video Source symbol. If you do not switch between computers often, this is fine. But since I use it for a desktop and a laptop, this becomes a bit cumbersome when I switch the computers at least once a day. With my old Acer screen, switching the computers is a lot easier: I just plug in the right video cable.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: It's a great monitor and I was very pleased with the price. Wonderful quality for screen resolution and it arrived on time very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check your specs if you are going to mount.
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor - but be sure to check your specs if you are going to mount it. There is a fixed piece on the back that cannot be removed - and it will block "most" brackets. Will only fit a certain Vega mount.
customer_reviews.author: RiverRat

customer_reviews.title: lives up to its reputation!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Samsung monitor and the name lives up to its reputation! The monitor quality is top notch and the picture in general is outstanding no matter what your doing, gaming, editing pictures or video, etc. picture quality is outstanding. I will be purchasing Samsung monitors from now on, I’m that impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great screen!
customer_reviews.text: This works as one would expect. It is a great peripheral for all of my devices. It is large enough to watch movies or computer work, like design space in real time dimensions without being too large or intrusive. The brightness is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Image, But Can't Mount
customer_reviews.text: These have excellent picture quality. Wide screen, bright, beautiful array of colors. Only issue: the part that the base stand clicks into (on the back of the monitor) sits too high to be able to use a mount. If you're looking to use a mount, find a different monitor. If not, this thing is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful display
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright, crisp, clear monitor that is light to carry/position. Easy to put together and the settings are a breeze to navigate. It's not difficult to turn it on or off like some people might claim, it's not; but there's an anolog stick (small) behind it you just reach under the lower right side and tinker with it. HDMI and DVI are both supported. It even has a great color temperature setting if you need to adjust it for reducing blue light eye irritation and an Eye Saver Mode option for further protection.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price! As a college student, between the quality, size, and simplicity, its perfect for the price, I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture When Used as a Computer Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a computer monitor because it was highly rated by owners. Nice, crisp images. I use it with an Apple Mac mini to replace an aged iMac. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Koons

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. My biggest problem is that controls on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. My biggest problem is that controls on the back. You have to feel around behind it to find the button, and to turn it off it takes several clicks to just to that since there is only one. Looks sharper than my other similar display
customer_reviews.author: Rich Gold

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Almost a perfect product at the perfect price. Everything is great except that the screen is not adjustable physically. So good I can get past it though for the price.
customer_reviews.author: William Bird

customer_reviews.title: works great, is light and thin, but has limited ports
customer_reviews.text: very few data ports on this model for video signal, but it does a great job for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Screen is good, it doesn't come with an HDMI cable. Also keep in mind this screen does not tilt at all, so if this is important to you I would look at another monitor. Otherwise it's good but I do wish you were able to tilt the monitor, the screen is pointed down slightly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Samsung monitor and the best and was never disappointed. This model is no different
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: great screen image
customer_reviews.text: absolutely outstanding !! great screen image. would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: edwierd

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor with touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: The monitor has been amazing. It’s very clear and I love the USB ports built into the monitor. I took a little bit in the beginning to get the touchscreen working right. After setting up I had to go back and read the instructions very carefully to make sure I was using the right ports.
customer_reviews.author: BettinaB

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, compact, sleek, good value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor, it is a good value and very sleek looking, compact and has been working 24/7 for months.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is a trusted name in our home!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for a friend who needed a second monitor to work from home. I chose this Samsung because I trust the name brand. It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Shertwo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice picture, easy to set up. added bose speakers works great.
customer_reviews.author: dana silva

customer_reviews.title: my desk looks better now.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it installed last night, my desk looks better now.
customer_reviews.author: Odion Edehomon

customer_reviews.title: tilt
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a past review because of the tilt base, it was wrong, I ended up prying the mount and it did have a tilt. so I recant my previous review and love this monitor
customer_reviews.author: john mahlum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was just exactly what I wanted and so very light for me to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Home

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 4K super precise graphics or gaming monitor, but for those who don’t require cutting edge color accuracy or super high frame rates, this is a great choice. It looks great, permits adequate color adjustment for my needs, is very clear and works right out of the box. The only thing they could do to improve it is to come install it and recycle the trash! (No, I don’t expect that. It’s a joke...) In short, I recommend this monitor highly for those folks who feel that having great clarity and color is enough.
customer_reviews.author: GWT

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome. Giant upgrade from my 17 inch acer. Beautiful picture highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C. Cells

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT TILT
customer_reviews.text: Colors are brilliant. It does not tilt AT ALL. I didn’t notice that and would not have ordered had I known.
customer_reviews.author: Scubootietoes

customer_reviews.title: The power supply sent with the monitor does not fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The power supply sent with the monitor does not fit. I cannot even turn it on to see if it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this monitor if you plan to use a wall mount
customer_reviews.text: Monitor looked great however the piece that is attached to the monitor which connects it to the base cannot be removed, well not with ease anyways. With this piece attached to the monitor you cannot connect a wall mount to it. To remove this piece you need to pop off the back of the monitor, this is where I broke my new monitor.
customer_reviews.author: David Taglieri

customer_reviews.title: No remote!!
customer_reviews.text: As with all Samsung monitors (and that is all we ever buy here) the color and image is crisp and beautiful. But be aware that this has NO REMOTE and NO SPEAKERS, so using it as a TV screen is going to be annoying. We use it as both a TV screen and a PC monitor, and our old one of this had two HDMI ports in the back so that we could have both connected and switch it back and forth whenever we wanted. This one only has one HDMI port, which isn't a deal breaker, but the NO REMOTE is. This is going back. If you don't need a remote, you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: orcatamer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for your money. I have two of them set up in my office at home. One I have had for a couple years and the other I have recently purchased. The pictures between the two being bought at different times are almost perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor Picture and Quality - Home Office Use
customer_reviews.text: Only Design Flaw is on the mounting. The stand component is fixed, and cannot be removed. It gets in the way of where VESA screws would go. Make sure you have spacers in order to mount the Monitor.
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Vesa mount is a joke - see pictures
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to mount this, look at my pictures. While the specs say this has Vesa mounts (true) the poor design by Samsung makes this almost impossible to mount. They put a permanent stand component just below where your Vesa screws would go. Their own directions basically say if your Vesa mount isn't perfect size for this space, good luck. They knew when they designed it that mounting would be very difficult. Luckily, the Vivo mount I used came with spacers and I was able to 'gently' shove it up to get around that ridiculous stand part that I don't even want.
customer_reviews.author: brownsfan019

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. And to correct a couple of previous reviewers ... this monitor DOES tilt perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star

customer_reviews.title: - To make the best display, use the 125% font size
customer_reviews.text: - Got it today. - To make the best display, use the 125% font size, this will make the chracters a bit bolder, and easier to see. - Colors look good. - Slim , so it fits well to confined spaced. - Price =129, decent.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IF YOUR PUTTING ON A MOUNT
customer_reviews.text: I tried putting this monitor on my vesa triple monitor mount and you can’t do that because the stand is in the way. The only way to get the stand out of the monitor is to open it. I tried opening it myself and the monitor broke.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, picture is pretty nice with several options ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, picture is pretty nice with several options to adjust the color, brightness, etc. I almost sent it back because I thought it didn't tilt. It does actually tilt, you just have to apply a little more than normal pressure to get it to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dean

product_meta.title: Samsung 24 inch SF35 Monitor (LS24F350FHNXZA) - 1080p, Dual Monitor, Laptop Monitor, Monitor Stand/Riser/Mount Compliant, AMD Freesync, Gaming, HDMI, Black
product_meta.description: 24" Samsung slim design monitor with contemporary style and round stand. Featuring a glossy black finish and simple stand, this is the perfect monitor for home or office use.
feature_bullets: Minimize eye strain during long working hours with Flicker free and eye saver mode reducing blue light emissions.
Flawless game experience with AMD FreeSync and Game Mode; Power Supply Type: AC 100~240 Volts
Wide Viewing Panel provides 178°wide viewing angle horizontally and vertically, so you can experience the optimal screen from any position
Eco-Saving Plus feature reduces screen brightness to save power, plus the screen brightness automatically transitions fluidly—reducing energy use even more
Incredibly slim and stylish design with an incredibly slim 10 mm thick panel
CONNECT MULTIPLE DEVICES like laptop, PC, desktop computer, mac and macbook pro ; Compatible with Xbox and PS4
Optimized for homeschool, home office, work from home, business and casual gaming
Mounting type: Wall-Mount (Size mm) : 75 x 75 mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars236 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
